MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 08-DEC-2020 13:53.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the  CH7 postcode area of Mold , affecting properties in Church Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:48 AM. Our engineers are on their way to the local substation to investigate and repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2 PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11: 01 AM on 8th December 2020.
